RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.forbidden_only_one_try: Incorrect authentication and one try left.
RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.first_access_password: First access to the password input
RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.revoked_password: By safety your password has been revoke. Press in "Retrieve my password" to obtain a new one

CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Create a new one
CHANGE_PASSWORD.PERSONAL_INFO: By security grounds, once the access password has been changed, to continue operating, you must access again by entering your new password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.REVOKE: For security your password has been revoked
CHANGE_PASSWORD.ONE_USE: Your password is to use one time
CHANGE_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_VALIDATOR: De 8 a 16 caracteres, al menos una letra en mayuscula, una minuscula, un numero y un caracter especial
CHANGE_PASSWORD.VALIDATOR: The input is not valid, check it please
CHANGE_PASSWORD.HOVER_VALIDATOR: Remenber that the Password has to contain 8 and 16 characters and include at least one uppercase letter, one lower case letter, one number and one special character. Plus must be different for the last 12 used passwords.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.CONFIRMATION_PASSWORD_VALIDATOR: The passwords need to be identical
CHANGE_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_VALIDATION: Both password must be the same

RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.invalid_new_password: The new password does not match with the confirmation.
RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.invalid_value_params: Failed to check restrictions on field values.
RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.invalid_password_auth: The new password is not correct. Remenber that this must be different to the last 12 that you used
RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.OK: The email change was successfully done

CHANGE_EMAIL.TITLE: Create a new one
CHANGE_EMAIL.VALIDATOR: The input is not valid, check it please
CHANGE_EMAIL.HOVER_VALIDATOR: Debes incluir un email valido. A esta dirección de correo enviaremos tu contraseña si necesitas recuperarla (revocación u olvido)

RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.OK: The email change was successfully done

RECOVERY.TITLE: Retrieve password
RECOVERY.TITLE_SECONDARY: We will send you an email to restored your password
RECOVERY.VALIDATOR: The input is invalid, check again, please
RECOVERY.INFO_MSG: We just sent you your new password to your email. This password is to one use only, we will ask you to change it to access to the Portal

RESPONSES_VALIDATOR.no_user_found: The data entered is incorrect. Try again
